input_text:
Job Title: Desktop Support Specialist

Location: Palmetto, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Customer Service, Information Technology

Description:
Position: Desktop Support Specialist
Position is at customer site / location in Palmetto, FL
Job Description:
The Desktop Support Specialist will provide day-to-day and advanced technical support for clients including Senior Executives and C-level individuals. This role will be responsible for support of the network, Audio/Visual equipment, mobile devices, VOIP phones, MAC and PC’s, printers, network switches and battery backups. This role will also require working with a team of individuals to support hardware and software upgrades, installations and troubleshooting.
Responsibilities include:
Provide senior executive-level and C-level end user support.Provide on-site coverage during normal business hours as well as on-call support which could occur before/after normal working hours.Provide set up and fully support Mac OSx and Windows desktop hardware and software, mobile and VOIP phones, network, audio/visual, and video conferencing systems hardware and software.Proactively identify, document and implement procedures to limit downtime and maintain a stable technology environment.Apply advanced diagnostic techniques to identify problems, investigate causes, and recommend and implement solutions in a timely manner.End to End ownership of end-user related incidents through escalation to external vendors or other internal resources.Develops, documents, and maintains solutions and standard operating procedures.Perform other duties as assigned.
Required Skills and Experience:
Proactive mindset and the ability to anticipate the needs of senior executive-level and C-level end users.Must be confident and possess the ability to explain complicated technical problems in terms non-technical people can understand.2-4 years Desktop Support or Service Desk experience2-4 years’ experience using an ITSM tools such as Remedy, ServiceNow, or VivantioExperience working with Intune, Office365, Cisco Anyconnect VPN, multi-factor authentication, Android, iOS, Mac, Windows, desktop hardware, peripherals, VOIP Phone systems, and audio/visual equipment issues.Strong customer service orientation and customer-facing experienceStrong oral, written, and listening communication skills.Excellent organizational, decision-making, and time-management skillsMulti-tasking capabilitiesAbility to work outside of normal business hours participating in an on-call rotation which can include nights, weekends and possibly holidays.Must maintain a professional image, attitude, and demeanor.Must demonstrate ability to work with others and promote a harmonious working relationship with other departments, field personnel, leadership, and customers.Ensure all necessary operational processes and procedures are carried out with a high level of attention to detail, expediency, and on-time delivery.Excellent punctuality and attendanceAble to lift devices weighing over 50 lbs.Occasional travel may be required on weekends, sometimes on short notice, to support business requirements.
Preferred Skills and Experience:
Using an operational ticketing system to record changes and work history details.Prior service desk, or desktop support experience2-year degree, 4-year degree, or technical training (technical school or military)Experience working with senior executive-level and C-level end users.

Experience Level (if available): Associate

output_json.title: Desktop Support Specialist
job_responsibilities: Provide senior executive-level and C-level end user support
Provide on-site coverage during normal business hours and on-call support
Set up and fully support Mac OSx and Windows desktop hardware and software
Proactively identify and implement procedures to limit downtime
End to End ownership of end-user related incidents
Develop, document, and maintain solutions and standard operating procedures
output_json.travel_requirements: Occasional travel may be required on weekends, sometimes on short notice
output_json.physical_requirements: Able to lift devices weighing over 50 lbs

other.content: Must maintain a professional image, attitude, and demeanor. Must demonstrate ability to work with others and promote a harmonious working relationship with other departments, field personnel, leadership, and customers. Ensure all necessary operational processes and procedures are carried out with a high level of attention to detail, expediency, and on-time delivery.
